definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

sentences.english: The working principle and system composition of shock wave soot blower were recommended briefly.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹了激波吹灰器的工作原理和系統組成。

sentences.english: Without lifting a finger, we get to enjoy sunrises and sunsets.
sentences.chinese: 不用吹灰之力，我們就可以享受日出日落。

sentences.english: You won't have any problem finding rice, noodles, or dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 你將不必費吹灰之力找到大米，麪條和餃子。

sentences.english: Weld the sealing seat to wall to support the front of soot-blower.
sentences.chinese: 密封支座與爐牆焊接固定，支承吹灰器頭部。

sentences.english: We had no trouble (in) finding his house.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒費吹灰之力就找到了他的家。

sentences.english: Thus did our hero execute the greatest exploits with the utmost ease imaginable.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，我們的英雄沒費吹灰之力就幹成了大事。

sentences.english: Individual blower mounted manual pushbuttons shall be provided.
sentences.chinese: 此外還應提供安裝在單個吹灰器上的手動按鈕。

sentences.english: They romped through their entrance examinations.
sentences.chinese: 他們不費吹灰之力就通過了入學測驗。

sentences.english: So yeah, she probably won't break a sweat playing an enchanted wardrobe.
sentences.chinese: 所以呢，她演一個魔性衣櫃大概不費吹灰之力吧。

sentences.english: I can do the work standing on my head.
sentences.chinese: 我可以不花吹灰之力幹好那工作。

sentences.english: Jones simply walked over at billiards .
sentences.chinese: 在彈子戲中，瓊斯不費吹灰之力贏了。

sentences.english: Automatic retraction of retractable sootblowers upon motor overload.
sentences.chinese: 一旦電機超載，伸縮式吹灰器能自動伸縮縮回。

sentences.english: i got this sort of comfortable soft shorts with no efforts.
sentences.chinese: 我不費吹灰之力弄到了這種綿軟舒適的褲衩。

sentences.english: Indeed, Buffett can win the game before ever stepping up to bat.
sentences.chinese: 的確，巴菲特不費吹灰之力就能在交易中大獲全勝。

sentences.english: Transferring cine film or slides to video should be a doddle.
sentences.chinese: 把電影膠片或幻燈片轉換成視頻應該不費吹灰之力。

sentences.english: Thus Yan Ying was able to remove three potential threats to the country of Qi without lifting a finger.
sentences.chinese: 於是晏嬰不費吹灰之力就剷除了齊國的三個隱患。

definition: to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
a forced draft (of wind, for smelting metal)/blast (in blast furnace)/bellows/to draw air using bellows
to inspect one by one/to list individually
